metadata.title: The Promotion You Didn't Get
metadata.subtitle: Lite
metadata.description: You were confident the next career step was yours, but someone else was chosen. Navigate rejection, emotional recovery, and strategic reinvention as you rediscover how your mind handles feedback, resilience, and long-term ownership.
metadata.hint: Tests your Feedback Receptivity, Emotional Recovery, Resilience, and Career Ownership

dimensions.label: Feedback Receptivity
dimensions.description: How openly you receive and act on developmental feedback

dimensions.label: Emotional Recovery
dimensions.description: How quickly you regain balance after a setback

dimensions.label: Resilience
dimensions.description: Your forward momentum when things don’t go your way

dimensions.label: Career Ownership
dimensions.description: How actively you take charge of your growth and direction

scenes.label: Scene 1
scenes.title: The unexpected announcement
scenes.body: You hear the news during a team meeting: someone else got the promotion—someone you quietly believed was less prepared. A dull wave moves through you.
scenes.tip: Your first move reveals how you manage ego and emotion.

options.label: A
options.main: Ask your manager for a quick chat.
options.desc: Direct, curious, and ready to face reality.

options.label: C
options.desc: You analyze the competitive landscape first.

options.label: D
options.main: Convince yourself you didn't want it anyway.

scenes.label: Scene 2
scenes.title: Your manager checks in
scenes.body: Later that afternoon, your manager asks: “How are you feeling about the news?” Their tone is careful.
scenes.tip: Your response reveals your openness to development.

options.label: A
options.main: "I’d like to understand what I can improve."

options.label: C
options.desc: You dig for clarity before emotion takes over.

options.label: D
options.desc: You hide frustration instead of using it.

scenes.label: Scene 3
scenes.title: The colleague who got it
scenes.body: In the pantry, the newly promoted colleague hints that they were surprised too. You feel something tense inside.
scenes.tip: Your reaction shows emotional maturity under discomfort.

options.label: C
options.main: Ask what feedback they were given.
options.desc: You look for clues into the decision.

options.label: D
options.main: "Why do you think they picked you?"

scenes.label: Scene 4
scenes.title: The internal reflection
scenes.body: At home, the sting returns. Your mind replays the meeting. The ‘what ifs’ and ‘should haves’ get louder.
scenes.tip: Your next step shows whether you spiral or re-anchor.

options.label: A
options.main: Review your past year and list concrete wins.

options.label: B
options.main: Tell yourself it’s pointless to try again.
options.desc: You give disappointment the steering wheel.

options.label: D
options.main: Distract yourself and avoid thinking about it.

scenes.label: Scene 5
scenes.title: The career crossroads
scenes.body: The next morning, you wake up with a touch more clarity. A question surfaces: What now?
scenes.tip: Your answer reveals your sense of ownership.

options.label: A
options.main: Request a development plan with clear milestones.

options.label: B
options.desc: You preserve autonomy but avoid repair.

options.label: C
options.main: Double down: work harder and hope next time is yours.

scenes.label: Scene 6
scenes.title: Shadow You Appears
scenes.body:
In a moment of stillness, a phantom voice plays in your mind:
Shadow You — the version who reacts to rejection with the opposite instinct.

“Why does this setback define you so much?”
scenes.tip: Your answer reveals emotional maturity and self-awareness.

options.label: A
options.main: "I want to rise from this, not sink into it."
options.desc: You treat the wound as fuel.

options.label: B
options.main: "I'm scared this means I'm not good enough."

options.label: C
options.desc: You lean into reflection with intent.

scenes.label: Scene 7
scenes.title: Choose your final door
scenes.body:
Three paths crystallize ahead — each a different way of rewriting your story:

Door 1 — The Safe Reset
Door 2 — The Strategic Renewal
Door 3 — The Bold Reinvention
scenes.tip: This final choice reveals how you reshape your next chapter.

growthSuggestions.text: Feedback is raw when you’re hurt — try sitting with it longer before dismissing it. Rich insight hides behind discomfort.
Recovery takes intention. Build emotional scaffolding: journaling, reflection, or speaking with a mentor.
Setbacks feel personal now, but progress returns through small forward steps. Consistency beats intensity.
Reclaim the steering wheel. Define your next milestone instead of waiting for someone else to choose you.
Your responses show emerging clarity. Continue turning reflection into action and you will reshape your trajectory.
